channel.title: I have a few questions about the Deltascape client, CMD file batch file
channel.description:
Hi, i am having troubles finding out where and how to change the text color automatically in the client so i don't have to use [code]::red, ::white, ::cyan, ect.[/code], and i am wondering where i can find that in the client files and how i am able to change that.
Now i have another problem... i cant get my cmd file working... when i type in ipconfig and press enter it comes up with [code]'ipconfig' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code] i have done all this before and it was working then, is there another way i can figure out my default gateway?

item.title: I have a few questions about the Deltascape client, CMD file batch file
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx

item.title: I have a few questions about the Deltascape client, CMD file batch file
item.dc:creator: @Weownzscape Weownzscape
item.description:
@Weownzscape wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:2, topic:253385”]change the jdk1.6.0_06
to ur version
and set ur enviromental variables.

and there bound to be a tut on how to change color of text, search it.[/quote] I have searched it, and ty. i did my variables a little bit ago… i cant find it at all… or its somewhere in the EGUI but i still can’t find it so… lol… Thank you. OH! reminds me i just updated it… haha so that could be a reason as well… lemme channnnge thattt

Read full topic
